title: Full Stack Software Engineering Bootcamp

title: Unfinished Project Completion
description: Rescued an unfinished project, finalized KPIs, streamlined financial reports, and collaborated with third-party resources.

description: Built an advanced SQL database management system during MIS coursework, creating complex queries to handle customer data and business metrics.
